title: It was good to meet you all
author: VD
content_html: Well, not quite everyone, but pretty much anyone who is likely to have come by for the first time this week. Especially you, Goldmund… and don’t forget to pick up the Shikibu.
content_text: Well, not quite everyone, but pretty much anyone who is likely to have come by for the first time this week.  Especially you, Goldmund… and don’t forget to pick up the Shikibu.
